cd $WORK # Not necessary, but trying to imitate err msg in TestRunInternal
go run $WORK/gopath/src/run/good.go
! go run $WORK/gopath/src/run/bad.go
stderr 'gopath(\/|\\)src(\/|\\)run(\/|\\)bad\.go\:3\:8\: use of internal package run/subdir/internal/private not allowed'

-- run/bad.go --
package main

import _ "run/subdir/internal/private"

func main() {}
-- run/good.go --
package main

import _ "run/internal"

func main() {}
-- run/internal/internal.go --
package internal
-- run/subdir/internal/private/private.go --
package private
